long_description: Retrofit your Nalgene, CamelBak or other wide-mouth bottle with the humangear capCap and enjoy easy spill-free drinking. Two-part capCap lets you drink through the small spout without spilling and easily fill and clean the bottle through the wide-mouth opening. Green, rubberized cap is easy to grip, even with gloves on. Wide strap with rounded edges carries comfortably in the nook of a finger. Works with 32 oz. Nalgene wide-mouth bottles, Nalgene OTG bottles, all CamelBak bottles, Cyclone bottles and other wide-mouth options.
short_description: Retrofit your Nalgene, CamelBak or other wide-mouth bottle with the humangear capCap and enjoy easy spill-free drinking.
